Row.Text: Gain [ICON_CULTURE] Culture equal to 15% of the construction cost when finishing Buildings and 30% when completing Wonders.
Resources along Floodplains receive +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. Owned Floodplains tiles grant +1 Appeal to adjacent tiles instead of usual -1.

It costs 20% less [ICON_GOLD] Gold to recruit Great People and the Market gains 2 [ICON_GreatWork_WRITING] Great Writing slots in Cities founded by Mali. [ICON_GreatWork_WRITING] Great Works of Writing receive +4 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.

Ramses, pharaoh of the black land and the red, beloved like Horus, your imperious face gazes out across the desert in countless stone images. Others claim to be Godâ€™s messenger, but you claim to be the sun incarnate. From temples built from the living rock of Egypt, your command calls your people to you. Rule now, and may none stand against the rising flood.

Sundiata Keita, Lion of Mali, your griots sing your praises! You rose from humble beginnings to fulfill the prophecy of your people. You are a hunter and a magician; now the time has come to be a king! Bring Mali from its humble beginnings to the empire it is destined to be.
